title: DEMON HUNTER Announces Fall U.S. Tour With WAR OF AGES, CONVICTIONS & CULTIST
description: Time to get your spiritual metalcore on. The post DEMON HUNTER Announces Fall U.S. Tour With WAR OF AGES, CONVICTIONS & CULTIST appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Time to get your spiritual metalcore on.
text: Prepare for a fall of blistering riffs and unrelenting heaviness: metalcore titans Demon Hunter have announced their There Was A Light Here U.S. Tour kicking off this September with support from War Of Ages, Convictions, and Cultist. The tour launches on September 19 in Louisville, KY with a performance at the massive Louder Than Life Festival, and wraps up on October 11 at the Brooklyn Bowl in Nashville, TN, offering fans across the country a chance to experience Demon Hunter's signature blend of melodic aggression and spiritual intensity. html:
Prepare for a fall of blistering riffs and unrelenting heaviness: metalcore titans Demon Hunter have announced their There Was A Light Here U.S. Tour kicking off this September with support from War Of Ages, Convictions, and Cultist.

The tour launches on September 19 in Louisville, KY with a performance at the massive Louder Than Life Festival, and wraps up on October 11 at the Brooklyn Bowl in Nashville, TN, offering fans across the country a chance to experience Demon Hunter's signature blend of melodic aggression and spiritual intensity. Get your tickets here.

9/19 Louisville, KY Louder Than Life
9/20 West Chicago, IL WC Social Club
